content: Texas is the only state in the US, where you have to prove citizenship with a passport or birth certificate to get an ID. Not driver’s license, an ID. To vote, you don’t even have to show that much evidence of citizenship. So it’s a cumbersome requirement on Texans that is not equal to norms. We’re not stupid, we see what the white, Texan majority is trying to do. Fortunately, there’s a judiciary branch of the Fed gov to keep those fools in check.
